content.json:
PurpleTeam Event Viewing Dashboard
(DASHBOARD) PurpleTeam :: EventViewer ¬ª Activities ver 1.24.6.01 (June 2024 Rev 1)

items.name: text - 0

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: resourceGroup
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| where id == "{Workspace}"
| project resourceGroup

items.name: parameters - 1

content.json:
üìå NOTE

Use the ‚öôÔ∏èCONFIG tab to add additional/custom tables or parses to be searched here. **MAKE SURE TO SAVE this dashboard after making changes!**

**‚ùó IMPORTANT:** You will need to visit the CONFIG page first to load the custom tables so they load on all the tabs.

The Endpoint_Name, Search_String and Search_String2 need to be filled to search. If searching by OR make Search_String and Search_String2 the same value.

items.name: text - 2

üñ•Ô∏è {Endpoint_Name}
Events associated to this end point by ‚û°Ô∏è {Search_String} {OR_AND} {Search_String2}

content.json: üìñ DeviceFileEvents

items.name: text - 4 - Copy

content.query:
DeviceFileEvents
| where DeviceName contains "{Endpoint_Name}"
| where (* contains "{Search_String}" {OR_AND} * contains "{Search_String2}")

**Version:** 1.24.6.01 (June 2024 Rev 1)

This dashboard is used to quickly view events triggered by an engagement, DFIR, or other by searching for specific strings.
